overview: Landing page for Digital Experience Healthcare featuring navigation, hero content, introduction cards, and a call-to-action section. Focuses on accessibility, responsive layout, and user engagement through navigation and theme toggling.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and menu links
Hero section with heading, subtitle, and image
interactions: Clicking navigation links routes to internal pages
Theme toggle button switches between light and dark modes
Skip to content link jumps focus to main content
CTA buttons likely navigate to service or contact pages
data_flow: Theme toggle updates DOM state via aria-pressed attribute
Navigation links trigger full page reloads to other static routes
No dynamic data fetching or API calls observed
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation and buttons
Alt attributes on images (decorative image marked aria-hidden)
Color contrast and focus states should be verified
analytics: Potential page view tracking on route changes
CTA button click tracking for conversion metrics
Navigation link click events for engagement analytics

Check theme toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
